solution.text:
Let the speed of car be x km/hr and the speed of train be y km/hr.
Then:
\({_{{i*2}}_\over x} + {_{{4*i}}_\over y} = _{j}_\) -----(1)
And,
\({_{{3*i}}_\over x} + {_{{i*3}}_\over y} = _{j}_ + {_{m}_\over 60}\) -----(2)
\({_{{3*i}}_\over x} + {_{{i*3}}_\over y} = _{{trunc((60*j+Decimal(m))/60,2)}}_\) -----(2)
Let, p = \({1\over x}\) and q = \(1\over y\)
Then, equation (1) & (2) becomes:
\(_{{i*2}}_p + _{{4*i}}_q = _{j}_\) -----(3)
\(_{{3*i}}_p + _{{i*3}}_q = _{{trunc((60*j+Decimal(m))/60,2)}}_\) -----(4)
Now, multiplying equation (3) by 3 and equation (4) by 2
We get,
\(_{{i*6}}_p + _{{12*i}}_q = _{{3*j}}_\) -----(5)
\(_{{6*i}}_p + _{{i*6}}_q = _{{trunc((60*j+Decimal(m))/30,2)}}_\) -----(6)
Subtracting equation (6) from (5), we get
0p + _{{6*i}}_q = _{{3*j}}_ - _{{trunc((60*j+Decimal(m))/30,2)}}_
_{{6*i}}_q =_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/30,2)}}_
q =\(_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\over_{{6*i}}_\)
From equation (3)
\(_{{2*i}}_p + _{{i*4}}_\times {_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\over_{{6*i}}_} = _{j}_\)
\(_{{2*i}}_p = _{j}_ - _{{i*4}}_\times {_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\over_{{6*i}}_}\)
\(_{{2*i}}_p = _{j}_ - {_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\over 1.5}\)
\(_{{2*i}}_p = _{j}_ - _{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\)
\(_{{2*i}}_p = _{{trunc((15*j+Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\)
\(p = {_{{trunc((15*j+Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\over _{{2*i}}_}\)
Since, p = \(1\over x\) = \({_{{trunc((15*j+Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\over _{{2*i}}_}\)
i.e., x = \(_{{2*i}}_\over _{{trunc((15*j+Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\)
And, q = \(1\over y\) = \(_{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\over_{{6*i}}_\)
i.e., y = \(_{{6*i}}_\over _{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\)
Therefore, Speed of train is \(_{{6*i}}_\over _{{trunc((30*j-Decimal(m))/(30),2)}}_\) km/hr and speed of car is \(_{{2*i}}_\over _{{trunc((15*j+Decimal(m))/45,2)}}_\) km\hr

content.text: Rahul travels to his office which is _{{6*i}}_ km away from his home partly by car and partly by train.He takes _{j}_ hours if he travels _{{2*i}}_ km by car and remaining by train.If he travels _{{3*i}}_km by car and remaining by train he takes _{m}_ minutes longer.Find the speed of train and car separately.
